      • \
      • \Aliyun_Log_Client

      Aliyun_Log_Client class is the main class in the SDK. It can be used to communicate with SLS server to put/get data.

      author sls_dev
      package SLS_PHP_SDK

       Methods

      Parameters

      $endpoint

      string

      SLS host name, for example, http://cn-hangzhou.sls.aliyuncs.com

      string

      aliyun accessKeyId
